data.text: Gwa Mkulu Nguluwi, undohole kulawa kwa wanhu wehile,
Wanhu awo wangiwika goya mnhumbula za hewo kudita gehile,
Myango zawo ziha kota za izoka,
Gwa Mkulu Nguluwi, unyamile na ndole za wehile,
Ndangumlonjela Mkulu Nguluwi, “Hegwe ndo Nguluwi wa heni.”
Gwa Mkulu Nguluwi, Mkulu wa heni, mlohozi wa heni yawele na mong'ho,
Gwa Mkulu Nguluwi, uleche kuwapa wehile gowalingugana,
Wihe wa ulonzi wa hewo uwafiche hewo wawo.
Mbuli za walinguwaheha wanji zileche kulutilila goya kuli isi,
Ndivizela Mkulu Nguluwi kangulewelaga mbuli za wanhu walingubunzwa,
Ndikomya, watanganiche wolitogola itagwa lya hegwe,
